titleStmt.title: An Act for the admitting of the purchaser of bishops lands to pay their whole purchase-moneys by VVeavers-Hall bills.
Laws, etc. 1649
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edward Husband, printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: On 4R: last word of first line of text: 'England'; first word of line below initial: 'there'; the last word of last full line of text: 'con-'.
Order to print dated 28 August 1648; also issued as part of a through-paged folio set with a table for the entire set added.
Ornament on t.p.; initial letter; text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
